title: Most important export partner countries for Bangladesh in 2017
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share in total export 12.9 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at Italy where Country is 4.1.
The lowest value at Country Italy is 3.15x times less than the highest value at Germany.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share in total export 12.9 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at Italy where Country is 4.1.
The lowest value at Country Italy is 3.15x times less than the highest value at Germany.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share in total export in the y axis.
The Share in total export is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
Country United States has the second highest value for Share in total export.
The highest Country Germany has 8.8 more Share in total export than the lowest Country Italy.
The Country Germany has the highest Share in total export, followed by United States, and United Kingdom. Down to the Country Italy which is the lowest.
The Country Germany has 1.6 times more Share in total export than average.
